text: he eemaan vaalo! tum jab nashe[1] mein raho, to namaaz ke sameep na jao, jab tak jo kuchh bolo, use na samajho aur na janaabat[2] kee sthiti mein (masjidon ke sameep jao), parantu raasta paar karate hue. yadi tum rogee ho athava yaatra mein raho ya striyon se sahavaas kar lo, phir jal na pao, to pavitr mittee se tayammum[3] kar lo; use apane mukhon tatha haathon par pher lo. vaastav mein, allaah ati kshaant (sahishnu) kshamaasheel hai
